item.title: Key Features
item.description: OpenNebula offers a simple but feature-rich and flexible solution to build and manage data center virtualization and enterprise clouds. This page provides a summary of its key features(*). To learn more about the infrastructure platforms and services supported in each version of OpenNebula, refer to the Platform Notes for each version. For high-level overviews and in-depth technical guides, please refer to OpenNebulaâ€™s White Papers.
